Jade & Fox Co. Facial Cleanser, Liquid Gold (2020 formulation)

Brand: Jade & Fox Co.

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Coco-Glucoside Tartrate, Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Organic Lavender Flower Water, Organic Oatstraw Extract, Glycerin, Organic Honey, Hydrolyzed

c Honey, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Provitamin B5, Vitamin E, Sunflower Seed Oil, Organic Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
